string.name: name
string.value: 検出されたナノウェーブ

string.name: desc
string.value: 「ドン・おネエ」から検出されたナノウェーブ。微量ではあるが、カブキ町の人々からもナノウェーブが検出された。これを手掛かりにカブキ町に隠れているネイトロジーの決戦兵器を見つけられそうだ。

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious bone. You might be able to make a spicy soup with this bone.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid, go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Heart Key which allows you to open the hearts of people who are eating lunch. You could use it to have people change their mind.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A thick meat loaf. It looks delicious.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: Very tough monster meat. It's really hard to chew and it tastes like squid.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: An Evil Spirit Seal Stone. Am I getting controlled by this stone?\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A colorful mushroom. Let's hope it's not poisonous\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's very fresh, just fresh.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A monster's tentacle. It looks disgusting, but some say it's pretty delicious.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: The soul of a bear. This food will literally have 'soul' if you cook with this.r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.value: A non-consumable piece of anniversary cake dropped by all mobs and anniversary cake mobs. These items will continually drop throughout the event. Since after 3 hours the town returns to a neutral state, this allows players to strategize their attacks. Town Cake Piece turn in total will be at zero at event start and will also return to zero 3 hours after an invasion, when the town returns to neutral state.

string.value: Take this to Oda Nobunaga to attempt the Headmater's Special Training once a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Certificate of Patriotism that proves the love for the nation. Can be acquired by hunting Boss Slime that appears in the field.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of the Heart Tree's memories, giving a glimpse into how the guardian of the Shadow Veil Forest became what it is today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Evidence of the Heart Tree's corruption.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical key created from collecting remnants from Gollux. If you contact the imitation heart using this key, you can move to where Gollux is.#cBut be careful, as the magical power will weaken after 1 day#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical key made from Gollux's heart fragment. It reeks of strong corrupted energy. #cBe careful when using this key, as you'll be immediately moved to Gollux: Head upon contacting the imitation heart with it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An extremely well-made Heart Tree key.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you look at the ticket REAL CLOSE, there is a message that says, " 3 will get you 30, 4 to 6 will get you 50, 7 to 9 will get you 80, 10 will get you a 100."

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious red key that looks like it works with RED Gachapon Boxes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment from the shipwreck of a vessel transporting cubes.

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Leaf High Regular Class Key

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to take classes once a day at Maple Leaf High School.

string.value: A complete map of the Delfino Hideout.

string.value: A file that Il Capo Canis was carrying.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coded document that cannot be made out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wait, this isn't a gift! It seems to be part of Vicky's evil plan to destroy the Spirit of Rock...

string.name: desc
string.value: The craftsmanship on Vincent's wig is phenomenal.

string.name: desc
string.value: This holds Blake's hopes and dreams of becoming a famous singer.

string.name: desc
string.value: Broken when Fort tried to pull the sword out. Only the sheath remains... hopefully Neinheart won't get angry.

string.name: desc
string.value: A prescription scroll written by Tae Sang, listing mysterious ingredients...

string.name: desc
string.value: Gross, why do you have this? It smells terrible.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Tae Sang's medicines. Will make you as powerful as a one-man army!

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Tae Sang's medicines. Will make you faster than a roadrunner!

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Tae Sang's medicines. Will transform you from a doofus to a genius!

string.name: desc
string.value: Tae Sang's medicine, supposed to make you more awesome.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Tae Sang's medicines. Will make you as energetic as a child on a sugar rush.

string.name: desc
string.value: Medicine Tae Sang made to treat people suffering from the after effects of alchemy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious medicine made by Mr. Ku. Take this to Mr. Do.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted flask, capable of collecting the willpower of past heroes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious energy swirls around this willpower...

string.name: desc
string.value: What is the mysterious energy that surrounds this willpower?

string.name: desc
string.value: Perzen's willpower is surrounded by mysterious energy.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lohd's willpower shimmers with bizarre light...

string.name: desc
string.value: Yuris's willpower gives you an uneasy feeling...

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Liver and onions, anyone? No. Don't do that. This smells gross.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wait, you actually made liver and onions? Well, supposedly #Carson# loves this stuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of an amazingly light alloy.

string.name: desc
string.value: An amazingly light metal alloy. Take this to #Maed#.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A contaminated soul from contaminated goblins. Not sure why you would test spells on something so messed up.

string.name: desc
string.value: An herb for the new warrior. It is said that it tastes so bad, it can shock bodies back to life. Yikes!

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A message sent to the Shaolin Temple's Chief Priest by Elder Jung.

string.name: desc
string.value: The venerable abbot's prayer beads were stolen by demons near the temple. It shines in the hands of a human being.

string.name: desc
string.value: The ultimate book on demons, hidden by the Chief Priest's master, #bMonk Laomo#k.

string.name: desc
string.value: 팥을 삶고 찹쌀을 넣어 만든 죽이다. 전설에 따르면 강시에게 효과가 있다고 한다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 닭, 양, 소 세포 샘플에 대한 분석 보고서이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 닭의 피로 다시 쓰여진 강시의 부적이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 닭의 피로 다시 쓰여진 천마 강시의 부적이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 어떤 여자의 마음이든 사로 잡을 수 있는 반지이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 쌉쌀한 맛의 마늘이다. 전설에 따르면 강시에게 효과가 있다고 한다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 송산 마을의 소년이 잃어버린 신발이다. 소년을 찾아 돌려주자.

string.name: desc
string.value: 신비로운 분홍색 젤리다. 먹을 수 있냐고요? 알고 싶으세요?

string.name: desc
string.value: 신비로운 분홍색 젤리다. 먹을 수 있냐고요? 알고 싶으세요?

string.name: desc
string.value: 구미호는 이 편지에 심혈을 기울였다고 한다. 그녀의 사랑하는 사람에게 전해주세요.

string.name: desc
string.value: 사람 형태의 가면이다. 어쩌면 이 가면으로 누군가를 도울 수 있을 것 같다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 파티 퀘스트 #c매드 하우스#를 진행하는 데 필요한 아이템이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 파티 퀘스트 #c매드 하우스#를 진행하는 데 필요한 아이템이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: The secret diary of the mysterious girl with the strange eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A jiangshi captured with the special jiangshi capture rope.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of soft leather used to make masks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glittering mirror given to you by Nine-Tailed Fox. It can differentiate between humans and demons.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the White Tiger Swordsman demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Eagle Swordsman demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Male Thief demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Censer demon.

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Gold Martial Artist Demon Orb

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Mini Gold Martial Artist demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Golden Giant demon.

string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Silver Spearman demon.

string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Haunted Graystone demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Red Zhanshi Spirit demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Haunted Helmet demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: An orb containing the soul of the Chief Priest demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you collect the set and take them to Cassandra, she will give you a wonderful item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bring back enough pieces to trade for the Left Bone Pendant.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bring back enough pieces to trade for the Right Bone Pendant.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of lead for the Bleigiessen fortune telling of Edelstein.

string.name: desc
string.value: Perfect fruit for satisfying Rudolph's sweet tooth.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you need to wake up in a hurry, this potent brew will do the trick!

string.name: desc
string.value: Festive light bulbs used for tree decorations. They can make anything look good.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ornaments used for tree decorations. They're so sparkly!

string.name: desc
string.value: Glitter to sprinkle on the tree. Somehow even more sparkly than the ornaments!

string.name: desc
string.value: When Wake-up Juice won't do the trick, try the prescription-strength version!

string.name: desc
string.value: An autograph book filled with autographs supporting Mas.

string.name: desc
string.value: A keepsake that belongs to an innocent Specter.\r\nWhy does #p9112008# need this?

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the strange black water Nue has been passing out to Specters. Said to improve skin softness, increase lifespan, and cure all sorts of otherworldly maladies. Only a handful are given out at sermons, so it is especially hard to come by.

string.name: desc
string.value: Supposedly, the religious text of Nue's followers. For a holy book, it seems sloppily transcribed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Venom from a Dusk Viper that lives near Grieving Grotto.\nTake this to the Spooky Specter to exchange it for Unholy Water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mask obtained by defeating Crazed Oni. \n#cUsed to restore a broken Sacred Idol. #

string.name: desc
string.value: A mask obtained by defeating Berserk Oni. \n#cUsed to restore a broken Sacred Idol. #

string.name: desc
string.value: A mask obtained by defeating Suspicious Oni. \n#cUsed to restore a broken Sacred Idol. #

string.name: desc
string.value: An old fire extinguisher. It looks like just air's coming out. \n#cYou can use it to remove the dust. #

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty gas can. \n#c Until recently, it was full of gas. #

string.name: desc
string.value: A hose attached to the gas can. It's relatively clean, and longer than you thought.

string.name: desc
string.value: It isn't clear what this key is used for.

string.name: desc
string.value: It isn't clear what this key is used for.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sakura received this from her father as a gift when he returned from a business trip in a distant land. It is one of her most treasured possessions.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rock looks perfectly shaped for training on top of. You know, like you normally do with rocks.

string.name: desc
string.value: An herb use in medicine by the Fox Yokai.

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty bottle to hold water from the Fountain of Life, which is located in the deepest part of the forest.\r\nThe Fountain of Life is to said to have #cgreenish water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bottle filled with water from the Fountain of Life! \r\nSome plants in Spring Valley require water from the Fountain of Life to flourish.

string.name: desc
string.value: This crystal bottle was specifically crafted to capture sunshine. #cIt takes about 30 minutes to soak in the sun's rays.

string.name: desc
string.value: The bottle is full of sunshine!\r\nSome plants in Spring Valley require sunshine to thrive.

string.name: desc
string.value: The animal fur that Zen mentioned. Collect it to find out where Lingling went.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mana Particles left behind by Nenne. Collect them to find out where Nenne went.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the litter that Mrs. Ming Ming mentioned. Collect it all and return it to her.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of the hats that the Monster Kindergarteners were wearing. Collect and bring 10 of these pieces to Mrs. Ming Ming and she will turn them into a hat.

string.name: desc
string.value: Loot used to pay Bounty Hunter Jett.

string.name: desc
string.value: This deck is part of JM's DJ equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mixer is part of JM's DJ equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's DJ JM's favorite pair of headphones.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a laptop used by DJ JM.

string.name: desc
string.value: This left speaker is part of JM's DJ equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: This right speaker is part of JM's DJ equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: This lighting rig belongs to DJ JM.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Maplehood Watch Coupon Fragment stolen by monsters. You can trade the pieces in for a fresh coupon.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's an Maplehood Watch Coupon Piece stolen by monsters. You can trade the pieces in for a fresh coupon.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Item used in Secret Stories]\r\nIt's a glob of concentrated anguish.\r\nThe Girl said it's used in making a potion that channels the dead...

string.name: desc
string.value: [Item used in Secret Stories]\r\nIt's the concentrated stench of death and decay.\r\nApparently it's needed for the ritual.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Item used in Secret Stories]\r\nIt's lumber to be used for repairing the buildings damaged by the Snow Monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Item used in Secret Stories]\r\nIt's stone to be used for repairing the buildings damaged by the Snow Monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small golden key that was hanging from around a Balrog's neck. It looks a little too small to open a lock on the Huge Door. Maybe it opens a lock for something smaller, like a diary?

string.name: desc
string.value: This fancy trinket serves as proof that its bearer is a warrior without peer.

string.name: desc
string.value: The food basket recovered from a Moustrosity.

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure basket recovered from a Moustrosity.

string.name: desc
string.value: A toy that a Papercraft critter was playing with. A child might want this.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen treat the Papercraft critter was carrying. Looks tasty!

string.name: desc
string.value: A withered-looking olive tree. It appears to have lost all color.

string.name: desc
string.value: A raven's feather. It's as black as the night.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white key you received from Adler. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key discovered inside a tree in the Land of Innocence after a thunderstorm.\r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key given to you in the Land of Warriors when you were mistaken for the 'God of Battle' in your enlarged state. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key found among Mansa's treasure-puke pile. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pitch-black key swallowed by a raven. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flashy crystalline key found inside a diary. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key made of cast iron given to you by Horemheb, the wealthiest person in the Land of Riches. It was the least valuable of his possessions. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Yellow Mage's plastic key. It feels cheap, but it's bursting with malevolent energy. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old man who carves tombstones carved this key out of stone. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old man who carves tombstones molded this key from clay. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heart-shaped toy key you received from a child in the Land of Innocence. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key made of striped candy you got from a child in the Land of Innocence. \r\nIt's one of the keys needed to open the Huge Door in the Land of Beginnings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A handy-dandy color collector capable of sucking the color right out of a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: The color collector is full of various colors harvested from monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy-looking set of Balrog-sized armor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A brand new teddy bear from Sunni's store. It's soft and huggable.

string.name: desc
string.value: This must be Tina's storybook. It's hard to tell though, as the color is in rough shape.

string.name: desc
string.value: An insignia signifying a candidate for the Kingdom of Lugunica's royal election.

string.name: desc
string.value: This once meaty bone has been picked clean!

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 5 magical materials requested by Roswaal.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 5 magical materials requested by Roswaal.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 5 magical materials requested by Roswaal.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 5 magical materials requested by Roswaal.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 5 magical materials requested by Roswaal.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a gorgeous, sparkling Diamond. It could be useful against monsters that like shiny things.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Festive present Krampus carried to distribute to nice adults. Of course, he hasn't quit his day-job!

string.name: desc
string.value: This little sardine is precious to the Ice Pepe Siblings, who are gathering tons of them for an unknown purpose.

string.name: desc
string.value: Once upon a time, a 50-million-year-old icicle was granted life, and became the Mistress of Ice. It's said the icicle formed slowly, growing 0.0001 mm every year. Someone has been writing bits of her legend down on paper and spreading it around. Something amazing will occur when you gather all of the papers and speak the three-digit password.\r\n\r\n#cThere's a number written on the icicle but you can't make it out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This leaf was once a Snow Rabbit's ear. Didn't anyone tell you? Leaves are murder!

string.name: desc
string.value: Fogo Azul or one of his lookalikes was sucked into this bottle and trapped.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a staff once wielded by Black Annis.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of inexplicably stylish shorts worn by Rimos. They smell a little funky.

string.name: desc
string.value: Once upon a time, a 50-million-year-old icicle was granted life, and became the Mistress of Ice. It's said the icicle formed slowly, growing 0.0001 mm every year. Someone has been writing bits of her legend down on paper and spreading it around. Something amazing will occur when you gather all of the papers and speak the three-digit password. \r\n\r\n#cThe number '7' has been carved into the icicle.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Once upon a time, a 50-million-year-old icicle was granted life, and became the Mistress of Ice. It's said the icicle formed slowly, growing 0.0001 mm every year. Someone has been writing bits of her legend down on paper and spreading it around. Something amazing will occur when you gather all of the papers and speak the three-digit password. \r\n\r\n#cThe number '3' has been carved into the icicle.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Once upon a time, a 50-million-year-old icicle was granted life, and became the Mistress of Ice. It's said the icicle formed slowly, growing 0.0001 mm every year. Someone has been writing bits of her legend down on paper and spreading it around. Something amazing will occur when you gather all of the papers and speak the three-digit password. \r\n\r\n#cThe number '2' has been carved into the icicle.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A slab of stone. This ought to work well for carving tombstones.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a crystal formed from compacted snow. There seems to be a secret power hidden within it.

string.name: desc
string.value: This magical eyepatch will dispel any fear! As long as it's a fear of heights.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chunk of unmeltable ice from El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a carrot-flavored cold medicine.\r\nIt's seems to be a miracle cure against the disease the Frost Fiends carry.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sample refined from 50 Snow Crystals. Who's ready for some science!?

string.name: name
string.value: Completing quests for The Afterlands awards 30% Bonus EXP

string.name: desc
string.value: The Afterlands are now available! 30% Bonus EXP will be granted for completing all Afterlands quests!

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet chocolate to share with a loved one.
Allegedly, eating this fills you with power and extends your lifespan.
You can eat it using the Choco Syringe.
#c'Valentine's Day is not about sharing chocolate!'"#

string.name: desc
string.value: A visitor ID Badge that allows you to enter the headquarters of Aspire Industries, creators of the #cWondroid#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key held by Guardroid Model 13 at #cAspire#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key held by Guardroid Model 6 at #cAspire#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key held by Guardroid Model 82 at #cAspire#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A work order used for work on the #cWondroid# project at #cAspire Industries#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A research diary detailing the entire creation and development of the #cWondroid# at #cAspire Industries#.\r\n#c[Classified TOP SECRET]\r\nClearance Level 3#

string.name: desc
string.value: An Elunite Crystal engraved with alien runes. It feels unlike any other Elunite Crystal you've discovered.

string.name: desc
string.value: A research sample harvested from the crystal-coated Eluna lifeform known as a 'Churmble.'

string.name: desc
string.value: A research sample from the 'Thalia Floatyfish.' It looks more like a monster than a plant.

string.name: desc
string.value: A research sample from the 'Deadly Biteysnek'. It appears to be capable of asexual reproduction at a cellular level, explaining the lifeform's abundance on this planet. Smells like chicken.

string.name: desc
string.value: Churmble that has been successfully captured and placed in a cage. You feel kind of bad, but science requires sacrifice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Atlas that has been successfully captured and put in a cage. That's no drab little crab. It's as shiny as they come.

string.name: desc
string.value: A photo of a ruined facility that appears to have once been used to research spaceflight.

string.name: name
string.value: Photo of Water Filtration Facility Ruins

string.name: desc
string.value: A photo of a ruined facility that appears to have once been used to extract and purify water.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a dark residue commonly obtained from the monsters found at Gold Beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's an old bone fragment that can be obtained from monsters at the Excavation Site. Despite its shabby appearance, it has great archaeological value.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a tissue harvested from a Drake. Apparently it's quite valuable for biological research.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a tissue sample from an artificial organism created by way of alchemy. It could be quite valuable for study.

string.name: desc
string.value: A component from a mechanical lifeform. It appears to have been crafted through the synergy of alchemy and engineering.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's an energy commonly found from monsters in Minar Forest influenced by Horntail. How you managed to collect it, only the developers can answer.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. It's calibrated to interface with the data collector in the Swamp Region.

string.name: desc
string.value: A photo of a ruined structure that appears to have once been used to study the stars.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. It's filled with data from the Swamp Region.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. Use it to collect data on Drake monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. It's filled with data on Drake monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the Lidium ore that Eremos asked you to obtain.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Ryuul data storage device that's been jury-rigged into a mobile data collector. You can use it to record data on the enemies you fight in Ellin Forest.\r\n\r\nApparently it's powered by a micro-singularity, so unless you're looking to destroy two versions of Maple World at once, maybe don't break it.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a fragment of Zakum's statue you collected for Eremos. He seemed eager to analyze it.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. Use it to collect data on the Minar Forest region.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a data storage device crafted using advance Ryuul technology. It's filled with data on the Minar Forest region.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ingredient destined to be part of a culinary masterpiece for the Absolute Taste event. Can only be used in Tier 1 food. Open the UI via the NPC or notifier and place it on the ingredient slot.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use these to have your Absolute Taste dish reviewed by the only food critic who counts, Chef Gourdon Ritzy himself. You'll need a new one for every time you get his feedback.

string.name: desc
string.value: It does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. 30% of your HP and MP will be recovered when you are revived. This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A safety charm. Keeps you from losing EXP when you get KO'd. \nCan only be used once before it expires.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet strawberry candy. Much like the Safety Charm, it does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. #cCan be used ONCE within the expiration date#

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy basket full of love. Much like the Safety Charm, it does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. #cCan be used ONCE within the expiration date#

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet pineapple candy. Much like the Safety Charm, it does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. #cCan be used ONCE within the expiration date#

string.name: desc
string.value: This will allow the possessor of the item to retain all of the EXP points even after death. The item will be discarded after use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Brings you back to the current map when your character is resurrected. Cannot be used in some party quests, event maps, and vehicles (boats). This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Most #buffs# you had before being resurrected will#c carry over# when you use this. \n#cSome# buffs will not carry over. You will automatically be asked if you want to use the item before resurrection.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mind of Maple Necklace that brings luck and hope to anyone who wears it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Shows how many pies and cakes have been turned in at each of the four towns. Also shows whether a town currently belongs to a faction.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sheet of sketch paper covered in a rainbow. \n#cDouble-click to open it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Gold Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Silver Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Gold Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Gold Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Silver Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Silver Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Gold Lock dropped from a monster. You can open it by double-clicking if you have a Maplenogi Gold Key.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Silver Lock dropped from a monster. You can open it by double-clicking if you have a Maplenogi Silver Key.

string.name: desc
string.value: Golden Chicken Effect was given as a reward for helping Lazy Daisy. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: This effect is for people who helped Lazy Daisy but failed to hatch the egg. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings. Double click on it to read!

string.name: desc
string.value: A one of a kind, untradable item received by a player for taking over a town during a Cake or Pie invasion or from #cNPC Pie Lord Tiara or Cake Boss Daniel# after participating in a Cake or Pie invasion.

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal issued by the OSSS. It can be used to purchase various core cells from Senior Researcher Jett.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used to purchase items from Fur Puff near White Christmas Hill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used to purchase rare items from Fur White near White Christmas Hill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 루디브리엄 메이즈를 탈출하고 획득 한 곰 인형이다. 에오스 탑 101층의 #c롤리#에게 각 종 아이템으로 교환 할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: The currency used within the Silent Crusade. Available supplies are determined by your rank.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gather enough Luck Coin and exchange it for rewards from #cNPC Inkwell#.

string.name: desc
string.value: 보스 원정대를 통해 획득 할 수 있는 코인이다. 자유 시장의 #c루시아#에게 다양한 아이템을 교환하는 데 사용 할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 자유 시장에서 잠수(의자 사용 시)를 통해 획득 할 수 있는 코인이다. 자유 시장의 #c루시아#에게 다양한 아이템을 교환하는 데 사용 할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even aliens love to have a little coin in their pockets! Bring it to Pico in NLC to exchange for a Nebulite.

string.name: desc
string.value: 파티 퀘스트를 통해 획득 할 수 있는 코인이다. 자유 시장의 #c루시아#에게 다양한 아이템을 교환하는 데 사용 할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is one squeaky-clean Spirit Stone. Take it to the supply soldier in Momijigaoka.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin from the Sengoku Festival. Use it to purchase items from the Sengoku Store during the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Spirit Stone purified by Tsuchimikado Haruaki. Take it to the supply soldier in Momijigaoka to receive the Spirit of the Soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: This silver coin is one of the Masked Gentleman's family heirlooms. Take it back to him to trade for various items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this to Goemon to exchange for totems.

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal coin issued by the OSSS. It can be used to purchase various core cells from Senior Researcher Jett.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can take it to Inkwell to purchase a Frontier special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Coins required to enter the Sword Art Online Dungeon. NerveGear is used to travel to different worlds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin to celebrate the funnest shopping day of all... Black Friday!

string.name: desc
string.value: It can be exchanged for items from Paul.

string.name: desc
string.value: A reward that Mr. Schrodinger only gives to exemplary students. You can use the Lockers at Maple Leaf High with these candies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these coins during the 9th anniversary event and use them to purchase all sorts of neat items from the 9th Anniversary Coin Shop.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: These coins are the future! Their value can only go up! Use them to buy special items from Roasty's Hot Summer Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use them to buy special items from Old Maple Event Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can exchange these stamps for rewards at the Attack on Titan Rewards Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is Star World's primary currency. Use it to buy items from the Star World Coin Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Put these coins into the game machine to play a game.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can exchange these coins for rewards.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet heart for Valentine's Day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect these and bring them to the Artifact Keeper at the Event Hall to get popular rewards from past events!

string.name: desc
string.value: Used to purchase materials for Beefy's Kitchen. You can only use them during the event period, and they will vanish afterward.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turn this in to Wonky in the Event Hall for sports equipment and scrolls.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin that can be found on Alishan, and is only accepted there. Take it to #cLunch Vendor# and use it to purchase all kinds of items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bring these to the Junk Food Merchant to purchase event items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin that marks the opening of the Reboot Server. Use it to purchase special items at the Reboot Coin Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stamp earned by recycling items received from the Style Random Box!\nYou can exchange them at the Style Random Box Stamp Shop, by the Free Market Entrance!

string.name: desc
string.value: A device capable of harvesting ambient energy. \r\nMerona got lost inside the Cube searching for this.

string.name: desc
string.value: A DNA sample that can be collected from PULSAR's clones.\r\nIt's been modified by PULSAR's biotechnology.\r\nYou can trade this with the Space Detective wandering around inside the Cube.

string.name: desc
string.value: A token that proves you belong to PULSAR.\r\nIt smells like icky pirate, but it could be valuable to somebody.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device to awaken mystical creatures and control their minds.\r\nBigby in the Hyperspace Cube is collecting this for unknown reasons.

string.name: desc
string.value: A currency used during the Water Wars event. Used coin to purchase various Hydroblaster Skills and items from each team's Supply NPC.

string.name: desc
string.value: 클라이언트 변경으로 소실되거나 변경되는 컨텐츠/시스템애 대한 보상으로 지급되는 코인이다.\r\n자유시장에 있는 Unity Shop에서 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin commemorating the Maple Music Festival! Use them to purchase special items from the Coin Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: The premium currency used by the BFF Finder app. You can exchange it for various special items at the BFF Coin Shop!

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative coin issued by Aspire. You can trade it to #cAlec# and #cKhun# in exchange for various items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtained by participating in the Mini-game Station event. Collect them and exchange them for exclusive event-only items!

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin earned in the Absolute Taste event. You can trade it for various items from the Spoon 'n' Pantry shop NPC.

string.name: desc
string.value:
You will earn 1.3x EXP while this coupon is in your inventory.

#c*Cannot be stacked with another cash item that has the same effect.
*Cannot be applied on characters above Lv. 200.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
You will earn 1.5x EXP while this coupon is in your inventory.

#c*Cannot be stacked with another cash item that has the same effect.
*Cannot be applied on characters above Lv. 200.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains basic items. Place this in the center of the Magic Gachapon Wheel to find out what items you can get, then press Start to spin the wheel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains good items. Use the ' = ' key to open the Magic Wheel. Place this in the center of the Magic Gachapon Wheel to reveal a good set of items, then press Start to spin the wheel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains great items. Use the ' = ' key to open the Magic Wheel. You can win valuable scrolls, mastery books, and rare equipment! Place this in the center of the Magic Gachapon Wheel to reveal a great set of items, then press Start to spin the wheel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to save one line of Potential on an equipment item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket used to fuse grade B or better Nebulites. It will be used automatically when you fuse grade B or better Nebulite.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this in the Cash Shop for a discount! After pressing the Buy button in the Cash Shop, click the Apply Coupon button to use. \n#cCannot be used for an item already discounted.\nCannot be used for an item under 500NX.#

Use this in the Cash Shop for a discount! After pressing the Buy button in the Cash Shop, click the Apply Coupon button to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Get 50% off any one cube item with this voucher! After you press 'Buy' to purchase an item in the Cash Shop, press 'Use Voucher' to apply the discount.\n#cThis discount can only be applied to individual cubes!#

string.name: desc
string.value: Get 50% off any one cosmetic item with this voucher! After you press 'Buy' to purchase an item in the Cash Shop, press 'Use Voucher' to apply the discount.\n#cThis discount can only be applied to individual cosmetic items!#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Cuddle Pup.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A battery that can be obtained from Aspire Guard Robots. It's intact and can be used right away.

string.name: desc
string.value: A battery that can be obtained from Aspire Guard Robots. However, it's useless, since it's severely damaged.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Engineer Shield designed to protect the user from hazardous conditions in Aspire. It prevents industrial accidents caused by waste compressors, bio-blocking lasers, and bio-blocking gaseous matter. The number of times it activates depends on how many you have. Each activation deducts one.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emergency kit used to repair broken and damaged Wondroids. It's not advisable to use it on humans.

string.name: desc
string.value: After enhancement, the 8-Blessing Charm loses its power and must be restored somehow.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a replica of the key that can open the prison door in Nyen's Hideout.

string.name: desc
string.value: This key can open the prison door in Nyen's Hideout. It can only be used once.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can access Adam and Eve's memories through the Data Connector.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Polar Cub pet.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that allows you to take the cable car to the peak of Silver Mountain. Can be used for 24 hours after purchase.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card key allowing you entry to your room at Snowdrift Lodge resort. Grants access for four hours starting at the time of purchase.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box of expensive jewelry belonging to a guest at the Snowdrift Lodge that was pilfered by a Thief Crow. Leave it with the hotel employee to return to its rightful owner.

string.name: desc
string.value: A currency required for the use of the Snowdrift Lodge's services and facilities. Visit an employee in the lodge's lobby to make use of these services.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Terrier.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Dice Master Game Entry Ticket.\r\n#cYou can talk to Game Master Jun via the event notifier to enter.#\r\nThis item will disappear once the event is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Dice Master Bonus Game Entry Ticket.\r\n#cYou can talk to Game Master Jun via the event notifier to enter.#\r\nThis item will disappear once the event is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Flurblynk.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Ghost pet.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Summer Shiba Inu

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Summer Shiba Inu pet.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Credits, the most common currency used across the galaxy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Cutie-mingo pets.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: name
string.value: Decide how to deal with this matter.

string.name: desc
string.value: For Caravan conversation window menu categories

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat belonging to Shulla's missing daughter. It's singed everywhere.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture frame blackened with soot holding a photo of Shulla's missing daughter.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy piece of wood hand-picked by a clever Eyeful.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy piece of wood hand-picked by a clever Eyeful.

string.name: desc
string.value: A loaf of bread found beneath the ruins of a building. It's completely burnt and covered in ash. There's no way it's edible.

string.name: desc
string.value: This wild Shrelephant Meat looks rich and tender.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bone-dry branches perfect for starting fires.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tough, stringy meat from a Raging Hellfang.

string.name: desc
string.value: The brooch Cayne lost in Eyeful territory. The crest of Afinas has been intricately carved into it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden necklace that seems to have been lost by someone.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rich gold watch that appears to have been lost by someone.

string.name: desc
string.value: This wild Shrelephant Meat looks rich and tender.

string.name: desc
string.value: The rope is a bit sticky and gross, but it looks strong.

string.name: name
string.value: Photo of Old Woman and Granddaughter

string.name: desc
string.value: The old woman and her granddaughter look happy. The granddaughter has blue-gray skin and demon's markings, just as people said she did.

string.name: desc
string.value: A helm made specially by Sanaan for Einar. It looks quite grand with those horns on either side.

string.name: desc
string.value: A type of medicine used for folk remedies in Abrup.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tough, stringy meat from a Raging Hellfang.

string.name: desc
string.value: This wild Shrelephant Meat looks rich and tender.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Werebeast fur is thick and warm, perfect for winter.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transparent blood just like that of the Actinops fish, a local specialty of Abrup. Is the Toxic Belcher really a mutated fish?

string.name: desc
string.value: Fembris' mighty fang which does not melt, even in fire. It's much bigger and sharper than other wolf monster teeth. Is Fembris really a monster of legend, or is it another mutated wolf?

string.name: desc
string.value: Giant Frostflail Yeti horn. It's much bigger and tougher than other Yeti horns. Is it really a mutated Yeti, as Slaka says?

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy piece of wood hand-picked by a clever Eyeful.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Frozen Optusa Leaf which can be found near an air hole. Used as an ingredient in Elva's special elixir.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transparent blood just like that of the Actinops fish. Used as an ingredient in Elva's special elixir.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Eyeful's shiny antenna. Used as an ingredient in Elva's special elixir.

string.name: desc
string.value: This helmet is clearly not from Abrup and matches Aruhi's eyewitness account. Is there truly some mastermind behind the kidnappings?

string.name: desc
string.value: A building stone dug up from the hilly mountains of Skuas. It is very sturdy.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Acquire a new representative/environment/situation exclusive to Caravan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases the rewards for playing one round of Caravan by 30%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases the rewards for playing one round of Caravan by 60%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases the rewards for playing one round of Caravan by 100%.

string.name: desc
string.value: A type of medicine used for folk remedies in Abrup.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin used only on the Lab Server. Can be used to purchase many useful items from the Lab Server Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Baby Dino pet.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Syaoran is searching for this card vestige.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card with the monster Sakura asked for captured in it. Look a little closer, and you'll see the Muddy Sprout Monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card with the monster Sakura asked for captured in it. Look a little closer, and you'll see the Royal Cactus.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card with the monster Sakura asked for captured in it. Look a little closer, and you'll see Flicker.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card with the monster Sakura asked for captured in it. Look a little closer, and you'll see the Black Mushroom Gang.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card with the monster Sakura asked for captured in it. Look a little closer, and you'll see the Befuddled Spirit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains the captured image of a location Tomoyo asked for.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# for a chance to obtain a #cCardcaptor Sakura item#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# for a chance to obtain a #cCardcaptor Sakura item#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that contains all the commands for your Kero-chan pet.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The fierce determination of free creatures who resist the powers of darkness

string.name: desc
string.value: A blank tape you can use to film the Lunar New Year video message. Find the Officer of the Day and deliver it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A video message containing precious messages from the officers to their loves ones. It's been wrapped in silk with great care.

string.name: desc
string.value: These fancy, red money envelopes can be used in the Lunar New Year Special Supply Shop. The Lunar New Year Special Supply Shop is available at the Lunar New Year Party, Henesys, Leafre, and Nameless Town from 01/30/2019 to 02/12/2019.

string.name: desc
string.value: The charm may have lost its power, but a little elbow grease and refining might improve it. Yoria says you should collect 88 of them!

string.name: desc
string.value: A pocket watch that Neinheart lent to you. He says you should find him when the alarm goes off.

string.name: desc
string.value: The alarm went off! Go find Neinheart.

string.name: desc
string.value: The still-burning flare that fell from Nyen. You can probably still use this to light the fireworks.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Retro World event coin! You can trade it for special items at the #cRetro World Coin Shop#.

string.name: desc
string.value: This cute little orange mush plush is a favorite among tourists, since it's one of the most recognizable monsters in Maple World. #cHunt Orange Mushroom-type monsters for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is no ordinary tree branch. It's giving off all kinds of weird energy! #cHunt Stump-type monsters for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This little jelly jiggler looks pretty tasty, but something weird might happen if you eat it. #cHunt Slime-type monsters for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: There's no telling what this thing is used for, but it's still an interesting curio. #cHunt Machine-type monsters for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This beautiful, sparkling snowflake never melts, even when the weather's warm! #cHunt monsters in cold, snowy regions like El Nath for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This unique souvenir captures a moment of warped time within its crystalline walls. #cHunt monsters in Temple of Time or Clocktower for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Some strange magic within maintains this item's beautiful teardrop shape. #cHunt monsters in water like Aqua Road for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: There's not much energy left in this, but it still makes for a unique conversation piece. #cHunt Arcane River monsters for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The raw form of this mineral gives off an almost ethereal light. #cHunt monsters in Mines, Dead Mines, and Mountains, or by harvesting Veins for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This little, green sprout is the perfect representation of a fresh spring morning in Maple World. #cHunt Plant-type monsters or harvest Herbs for this.#

string.name: desc
string.value: You can feel a powerful energy from deep within. No one knows what these are really used for, but the one thing that's certain is that these aren't something just anyone can get their hands on. #cDefeat boss monsters to obtain these.#

string.name: desc
string.value: These tickets used to get you entry to the excitement and adventure of Monster Park, but now they're more of a collectible from another time. #cCan be obtained once Monster Park is cleared#

string.name: desc
string.value: Several photos of the most famous people in Maple World. The best of these will make for a great scrapbook!

string.name: desc
string.value: Several photos of the most famous places in Maple World. The best of these will make for a great scrapbook!

string.name: desc
string.value: Several photos of the most infamous monsters in Maple World. The best of these will make for a great scrapbook!

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny coin that looks just like BROWN. CONY probably loves these... You can swap them for all kinds of items at the LINE FRIENDS Coin Shop. Talk to BROWN in #cHenesys#, #cLeafre#, or #cChu Chu Village# to visit the Coin Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: This humble leaf is the ultimate symbol of everything Maple World. Collect a bunch for Cassandra, and she'll swap them for a LINE FRIENDS souvenir. #cCan be obtained by hunting monsters near your level.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scorchingly hot blue flame might just set fire to anything it comes into contact with.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect the unique sounds monsters make from time to time to create a Creative Rhythm.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've collected the surrounding sound and completed a Fantastic Melody.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've collected the unique sounds that monsters make and completed a Creative Rhythm.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've eliminated the Poseur Musicians and their dissonant, sub-par efforts to complete a Perfect Harmony.

string.name: desc
string.value: It does not let the user lose EXP points after death, as long as it's in possession. 30% of your HP and MP will be recovered when you are revived. This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Most buffs you had before being resurrected will carry over when you use this. #cSome buffs will not carry over.# \nYou will automatically be asked if you want to use the item before resurrection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Brings you back to the current map when your character is resurrected. Cannot be used in some party quests, event maps, and vehicles (boats). This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flora sample taken from the plants in Masteria. When analyzed in Elpam's research, it might yield important information.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ecological sample taken from the animals in Masteria. When analyzed in Elpam's research, it might yield important information.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 'soil' sample taken from a top predator in Masteria. When analyzed in Elpam's research, it might yield important information.

string.name: desc
string.value: 마스테리아 전역에 퍼진 오염 물질이다. 외계 기술로 정제되었으며, 에일리언에 대한 연구를 이끌 필수적인 단서를 제공 할 지도 모른다.

string.name: desc
string.value: You got this coin for participating in Extravagameza! Use it to purchase special items!

string.name: desc
string.value: Core circuitry taken from the dangerous machines roaming Aspire's underground factory. By analyzing these, you may be able to figure out how Scion is still operational.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret file containing detailed information on Krania's various contingency plans for the future.

string.name: desc
string.value: Parts taken from the machines remaining after the destruction of the Aspire facility. They may prove vital to saving Spencer's life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Parts taken from the machines remaining after the destruction of the Aspire facility. They may prove vital to saving Spencer's life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A voluminous log that contains records of everything that took place at Aspire Industries. It would likely be an invaluable asset to any future research into androids and artificial intelligence.

string.name: desc
string.value: You captured a Reassembled Engineer that was lurking around the hideout.\nBring them to Phoebe.

string.name: desc
string.value: An inconspicuous, unmarked button. You don't know what will happen if you press it, so it's probably best to avoid the temptation.

string.name: desc
string.value: Food specially formulated for hamsters. Apparently, it's rich in minerals that encourage lustrous, healthy fur, and high in fiber to help with digestion.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Tour Coin. You can use it to purchase some of the prized possessions Lulu Spinel has collected from her various film shoots.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mark in the shape of the Silver Wolf. Can be exchanged for a Silver Wolf Weapon. Usable at the #cMark of the Silver Wolf Exchanger# in #cMomijigaoka#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cSengoku Ki# obtained by completing Sengoku Scroll objectives. Take it to #cMouri Motonari# to use in#c increasing the level of the Dawn's Bloom skill#.

string.name: desc
string.value: An investigation journal where Pipopa's keeps his case notes.

string.name: desc
string.value: An intricately carved golden toad sculpture. It looks very valuable.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of cloth torn from someone's garment.

string.name: desc
string.value: 언데드 몬스터의 부적을 떼어 온 것이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 스톤 골렘의 몸의 일부분을 이루고 있던 신비로운 돌 조각이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 다크 스톤 골렘의 몸의 일부분을 이루고 있던 신비로운 돌 조각이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 루팡의 모습을 쏙 빼닮은 작은 인형이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 타우로마시스의 뿔을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하고 무겁다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 신비한 빛을 내는 단단한 용의 가죽이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 좀비 루팡이 지니고 다니던 저주받은 인형이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 리게이터의 가죽을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하고 질기다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 크로코의 가죽을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하고 질기다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 레이스가 남긴 이상한 느낌이 드는 약이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 이벤트게임 참가 기념품이다. 금으로 만들어져 있어 상점에 비싸게 팔 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 아이언 호그의 다리를 감싸고 있던 강철로 된 발굽이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 멜러디가 각종 마법을 만들기 위해 보관하던 개구리가 든 병이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 작은 박쥐인 스티지의 날개를 떼어온 것이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 로랑의 다리에 붙어 있던 거대한 집게 발을 떼어온 것이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 클랑의 다리에 붙어 있던 거대한 집게 발을 떼어온 것이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 엄티가 등에 지고 다니던 등껍질을 떼어온 것이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 타우로스피어의 뿔을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하고 무겁다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 주니어 예티의 가죽을 잘라온 것이다. 부드럽고 하얀 털로 이루어져 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 예티의 뿔을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하여 잘 부서지지 않는다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 페페의 부리를 잘라온 것이다. 황금빛의 단단한 부리이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 헥터의 꼬리를 잘라온 것이다. 갈색의 조금 거칠거칠한 털이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 화이트 팽의 꼬리를 잘라온 것이다. 흰색의 매우 부드러운 털이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 웨어 울프의 발톱을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 날카로워 조심히 다뤄야 한다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 라이칸 스로프의 발톱을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 날카로울 뿐 아니라 아주 단단하여 쉽게 부술 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 다크 주니어 예티의 가죽을 잘라온 것이다. 거칠고 검은 털로 이루어져 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 다크 예티의 뿔을 잘라온 것이다. 매우 단단하여 잘 부서지지 않는다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 다크 페페의 부리를 잘라온 것이다. 황금빛의 단단한 부리이다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 네펜데스의 씨앗을 잘라온 것이다. 독성이 있어서 함부로 먹어서는 안된다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 스타 픽시가 떨어뜨린 별 조각이다. 아름다운 빛을 내고 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 루나 픽시가 떨어뜨린 달 조각이다. 아름다운 빛을 내고 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 러스터 픽시가 떨어뜨린 태양 조각이다. 아름다운 빛을 내고 있다.

string.value: 다크 네펜데스의 씨앗을 잘라온 것이다. 독성이 있을 뿐더러 뾰족한 가시가 나 있어서 조심히 다루어야 한다.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: 샐리온의 꼬리를 잘라온 것이다. 매우 부드러우며 만져보면 무척 뜨겁다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 라이오너의 꼬리를 잘라온 것이다. 매우 부드러우며 만져보면 전기가 일어난다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 그류핀의 꼬리를 잘라온 것이다. 매우 부드러우며 만져보면 무척 차갑다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 주니어 샐리온, 주니어 라이오너, 주니어 그류핀으로부터 얻을 수 있는 뿔이다.

string.value: 리티의 털 뭉치이다. 작고 부드러워 금방이라도 날아갈 것 같다.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: 누군가가 설치해 둔 것으로 보이는 쥐 덫이다. 작동하지 않도록 조심히 다뤄야 한다.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
